short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a countdown before specified timestamps in YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jumpscare Notifier for YouTube

😱 Prepare yourself to enjoy your favorite horror and thriller content without the stress of unexpected jumpscares! 🎥 Jumpscare Notifier for YouTube provides you with the tools needed to predict and manage jumpscares, enhancing your viewing experience. 🚨

Key Features:

Custom Timestamps: 🕒 Easily add, edit, and organize specific timestamps within videos where jumpscares occur, allowing for precise control and personalization.

Countdown Alerts: ⏱️ Receive a visual countdown leading up to each jumpscare, fully customizable in terms of duration and color to fit your preferences and enhance preparedness.

Sound Notifications: 🔊 Enable or disable sound alerts based on your preferences to accommodate your unique viewing experience.

Note: 

You might need to refresh the webpage after adding the extension for it to take effect! ⚠️
